property.description: override so_mask indications when screen is off
property.name: persist.radio.force_ltd_sys_ind

property.description: override using DSD indications for data registration
property.name: persist.radio.dont_use_dsd

property.description: drops the output TCP RST packets property when screen is OFF
property.name: persist.data.tcp_rst_drop

property.description: System property for setup data call timeout, supported range 0-99999.if it is set to 0, a default timeout value QCRIL_DATA_PROPERTY_TIMEOUT_DEFAULT will be used
property.name: persist.qcril.datacall_timeout

property.description: RIL LTE default profile value
property.name: persist.qcril.attach.profile

property.description: Setting this property will enable EPC profile look up in QC baseband
property.name: persist.data.dont_use_epc

property.description: Setting this property would disable QCRIL DATA Partial Retry for few temporary call end reasons
property.name: persist.qcril.disable_retry

property.description: RIL data max partial retry timeout
property.name: persist.qcril.max_retry_timeout

property.description: Android property to disable the SIM toolkit capabilities in order to test SIM toolkit scenarios without interference
property.name: persist.qcril_gstk.disable

property.description: Android system property for fetching the modem type (No default value)
property.name: ro.baseband

property.description: Android property used to indicate that Android participates in the Vcc deactivtion of the UICC, in order to synchronize it with an optional CLF on the device
property.name: persist.qcril_uim_vcc_feature

property.description: Property to cache the temporary unlock status of the SIM card across RILD restarts. (No default value)
property.name: persist.radio.uim_temp_unlock_%(instance)

property.description: Property to indicate the P2 value during selection of a specific AID on the UICC. (No default value)
property.name: persist.fci
property.validValues: A valid set entry in the property buffer must contain at minimum AID data (variable), an AID terminator character '=' separating the AID from the FCI template indicator, an FCI template indicator (1 byte) and the terminating ASCII semicolon or string terminator (1 byte). Ex. "A0003456=1;A5565345=2" AID1 = "A0003456", FCI template = '1' and ';' terminates the set AID2 = "A5565345", FCI template = '2' and '\0' terminates the set

property.description: time gap between DTMF STOP and START (No default value)
property.name: ro.ril.dtmf_pause_interval

property.description: If SGLTE CSFB feature is supported
property.name: persist.radio.sglte_csfb

property.description: Provide Radio Access Technology (RAT) information in the network scan request. Legacy: Add an extra entry in the RIL_REQUEST_QUERY_AVAILABLE_NETWORKS response, containing the RAT Combine: Append the RAT name to the plmn string (response[n+2]) other: Don't include the RAT information (No default value)
property.name: persist.radio.rat_on

property.description: To enable answer hold, to handle waiting calls in CDMA
property.name: persist.radio.kddi_hold_answ_on

property.description: RIL feature to accept/reject ims sms retries on 3gpp
property.name: persist.radio.ims_retry_3gpp

property.description: RIL feature to accept/reject ims sms retries on 3gpp2
property.name: persist.radio.ims_retry_3gpp2

property.description: This enables the feature to send OEM hook indication to both rild and oem socket. If the property is set to false or 0, then feature will be disabled If the property is true or 1 or not set then feature is enabled
property.name: persist.radio.oem_ind_to_both

property.description: This is to enable oem socket based OEM hook message communication. If the property is set to false or 0, then feature will be disabled. If the property is true or 1 or not set then feature is enabled
property.name: persist.radio.oem_socket

property.description: User will have to set it to 0 to disable the same and use rild socket for OEM messages.
property.name: persist.radio.sap_silent_pin

property.description: block allow data for single SIM. 0 for false, 1 for true
property.name: persist.radio.block_allow_data

property.description: Ignore RIL_REQUEST_SET_INITIAL_ATTACH_APN and RIL_REQUEST_SETUP_DATA_CALL when using test mbn
property.name: persist.radio.suppress_req

property.description: RIL feature to report data registration state not only looking for preffered technology reported through DSD. It should look for RAT on which IMS registerred
property.name: persist.radio.data_con_rprt

property.description: conditionally initialize heap memory tracker list (No default value)
property.name: persist.radio.track_heap_mem

property.description: Legacy. For sglte targets (ro.baseband==sglte), specify which modem to use for voice (No default value)
property.name: persist.radio.voice.modem.index

property.description: ignore IMS WLAN vsid handling (No default value)
property.name: persist.radio.ignore_ims_wlan

property.description: previous MBN version information stored as a string. Used for checking if MBN is needed to be loaded into DB (No default value)
property.name: persist.radio.ver_info

property.description: if SW MBN has been loaded. 0 for false, 1 for true
property.name: persist.radio.sw_mbn_loaded

property.description: if HW MBN has been loaded. 0 for false, 1 for true
property.name: persist.radio.hw_mbn_loaded

property.description: RIL log to file is enabled. 0 for false, 1 for true
property.name: persist.radio.ril_log_enabled

property.description: ADB log is enabled. 0 for false, 1 for true
property.name: persist.radio.adb_log_on

property.description: Dump RIL message payload to log. 0 for false, 1 for true
property.name: persist.radio.ril_payload_on

property.description: For on-device ril logging, specify the time period, in seconds, at which log data is flushed into the file
property.name: persist.radio.ril_log_interval

property.description: Enable QCRIL_LOG_ADDITIONAL logs, used to trace mutex usage
property.name: persist.radio.ril_extra_debug

property.description: HW MBN auto seleciton feature. 0 for disable, 1 for enable
property.name: persist.radio.hw_mbn_update

property.description: SW MBN auto selection feature, 0 for disable, 1 for enable
property.name: persist.radio.sw_mbn_update

property.description: VOLTE information for SW MBN auto selection. 0 is Non_VoLTE, 1 is VoLTE
property.name: persist.radio.sw_mbn_volte

property.description: Market information for SW MBN auto selection. 0 is Subsidized, 1 is OpenMkt
property.name: persist.radio.sw_mbn_openmkt

property.description: Emergency number ECC list for instance 0 (No default value)
property.name: ril.ecclist

property.description: Emergency number ECC list for non-zero instance id (No default value)
property.name: ril.ecclist%(instance)

property.description: Select the stack id to use for a particular ril instance (No default value)
property.name: persist.radio.msim.stackid_%(instance)

property.description: RIL pre client init wake lock held
property.name: ril.qcril_pre_init_lock_held

property.description: Do not init csvt
property.name: persist.radio.do_not_init_csvt

property.description: Provide a list of frequencies for LTE-Wifi coexistance
property.name: persist.radio.coex_freq

property.description: This property sets the range of the coex channel.
property.name: persist.radio.coex_channel

property.description: QCRIL operator name (No default value)
property.name: persist.env.spec

property.description: When set to 1, the SIM card will not be powered down in Airplane Mode
property.name: persist.radio.apm_sim_not_pwdn

property.description: RIL domestic service is power save enabled
property.name: persist.radio.add_power_save

property.description: Whether to force a network search immediately after modem comes online. This is discouraged, as it can have an impact on power consumption
property.name: persist.radio.force_nw_search

property.description: To simulate voice support on LTE when the same is not reported by modem
property.name: persist.radio.voice_on_lte

property.description: Legacy. For targets not supporting qmi_nas_sys_info_ind, whether to report restricted state reported through call barring status
property.name: persist.radio.report_rstate

property.description: When either long operator name or short operator name is missing, whether the fill the missing field with the one available
property.name: persist.radio.fill_eons

property.description: To prevent QMI RIL from sending indications to ATEL when non essential fields have changed in sys info indication.
property.name: persist.radio.limit_sys_info

property.description: To configure RIL not to syncronize with card while powering down
property.name: persist.radio.no_wait_for_card

property.description: To delay/prevent RIL from reporting NULL bearer durring data inter-rat handoff. Hand-off typically takes less than 22 seconds.
property.name: persist.radio.snapshot_timer

property.description: Whether to enable the data registration snapshot feature
property.name: persist.radio.snapshot_enabled

property.description: RIL feature to receive data dormancy indication. on for always receive, on_screen_state for only receive when screen is on, off for not receive
property.name: persist.radio.rcv_data_dorm_ind

property.description: This feature is to enable the limited sys indication for data. If 1, then enabled. If 0 or not set then disabled
property.name: persist.radio.data_ltd_sys_ind

property.description: Legacy customer specifc scenario.Get operator name from SE 13 table only for perform network scan
property.name: persist.radio.use_se_table_only

property.description: To enable RIL to use NV 10 configuration to determine the mode preference
property.name: persist.radio.mode_pref_nv10

property.description: This feature is to enable custome emergency number evaluation based upon sim card. If 1, then enabled. If 0 or not set then disabled
property.name: persist.radio.custom_ecc

property.description: This feature is to enable custom emergency number evaluation based upon network. If 1, then enabled. If 0 or not set then disabled
property.name: persist.radio.custom_nw_ecc

property.description: To consider modem roam status of 64 as home as opposed to roaming.
property.name: persist.radio.eri64_as_home

property.description: To enable RIL to prefer SPN over PLMN name for operator and network scan processes
property.name: persist.radio.prefer_spn

property.description: To filter out duplicate network scan results.
property.name: persist.radio.proc_nw_scan

property.description: To configure prefered domain to be used while retrieving EONS information
property.name: persist.radio.sglte.eons_domain

property.description: To enable whether to give roaming network preference over home network while retrieving EONS information
property.name: persist.radio.sglte.eons_roam

property.description: To facilitate emergency call when modem is in LPM
property.name: persist.radio.prov_emer_in_lpm

property.description: RIL would need to relay operating mode changes to telephony irrespective of whether RADIO_POWER request is being handled or not when this property is set to "1"
property.name: persist.radio.relay_oprt_change

property.description: Consider LTE limited service as part of voice radio tech update
property.name: persist.radio.lte_vrte_ltd

property.description: Consider 3gpp limited service as part of data registration status update
property.name: persist.radio.3gpp_drte_ltd

property.description: Disable managed roaming feature
property.name: persist.radio.no_cons_man_roam

property.description: This property needs to be set to "1" so that PBM indications are not disabled for a specified time at bootup
property.name: persist.radio.wait_for_pbm

property.description: QMI RIL should not disable the PBM indications for a specified time (indicated by the value of this property or 90 seconds by default) after they have been enabled at bootup.
property.name: persist.radio.wait_for_pbm_time

property.description: support SIB16 time. 0 for false, 1 for true
property.name: persist.radio.sib16_support

property.description: A bitmask of the lte bands to be reported by QCRIL_EVT_HOOK_GET_PREFERRED_NETWORK_BAND_PREF
property.name: persist.radio.lte_full_band

property.description: While generating RIL_UNSOL_CELL_INFO_LIST, the maximum the refresh period will be
property.name: persist.radio.cinfo_sweep_limit

property.description: Use static table of country-specific operator names (cn and tw currently implemented)
property.name: persist.radio.use_cc_names

property.description: defer mode pref setting until device gets to online
property.name: persist.radio.dfr_mode_set

property.description: This property need to be set to "1" for RIL to report RIL_VAL_REG_REGISTRATION_DENIED when reject cause is QMI_NAS_REJ_CAUSE_PLMN_NOT_ALLOWED or QMI_NAS_REJ_CAUSE_NO_SUITABLE_CELL_LA
property.name: persist.radio.reg_den_rej_cause

property.description: To indicate whether modem CSG info is available.
property.name: persist.radio.csg_info_avlbl

property.description: RIL should pass srv_type as CS_ONLY if this property is set to "true" or "1".
property.name: persist.radio.cs_srv_type

property.description: During Screen OFF, limit SYS_INFO_IND for RAC change as well if property set.
property.name: persist.radio.limit_rac_change

property.description: If set to "1", RIL will send ONLINE cmd during bootup
property.name: persist.radio.poweron_opt

property.description: Set by QCRIL when the target supports SGLTE (No default value)
property.name: persist.radio.sglte_target

property.description: simultaneous voice and data support is present on the device for LTE (No default value)
property.name: ro.ril.svlte1x

property.description: simultaneous voice and data support is present on the device for DO (No default value)
property.name: ro.ril.svdo

property.description: Set by QCRIL when the centralized EONS feature is supported by modem (No default value)
property.name: persist.radio.eons.enabled

property.description: build display ID
property.name: ro.build.display.id

property.description: Set by QCRIL with the mcc and mnc of the operator, as obtained through the NITZ message (No default value)
property.name: persist.radio.nitz_plmn_%(instance)

property.description: QMI RIL tune away
property.name: persist.radio.tuneaway_%(instance)

property.description: QMI RIL paging priority
property.name: persist.radio.paging_priority_%(instance)

property.description: To specify the tye of multi sim supported by the device. This should match the modem configuration. Any value other than tsts,dsda or dsds sets the device in single-sim configuration (No default value)
property.name: persist.radio.multisim.config

property.description: To enable RIL to power down the UIM card If device is in APM at bootup, it is set by telephony.
property.name: persist.radio.airplane_mode_on

property.description: Whether QCRIL should enable its voip functionality
property.name: persist.radio.is_voip_enabled

property.description: custom hardcoded emergency number list count
property.name: persist.radio.ecc_hard_count

property.description: Custom hardcoded emergency number list fallback count
property.name: ril.nosim.ecc_list_count

property.description: Set by QCRIL with the list of emergency numbers for the first ril instance (No default value)
property.name: ril.ecclist

property.description: Set by QCRIL with the list of emergency numbers for the second ril instance (No default value)
property.name: ril1.ecclist

property.description: Poweron optimization mode preference for current instance
property.name: persist.radio.pwropt_modepref_%(instance)

property.description: default network
property.name: persist.radio.default_network

property.description: once enabled this property will result in requesting modem to send PLMN name always irrespective of display condition
property.name: persist.radio.always_send_plmn

property.description: This property backups the modem_pref and restores it after selecting PLMN with RAT
property.name: persist.radio.restore_mode_pref

property.description: enable manual network reject counter feature to count the number of indication instead of timer for LOCATION_UPDATE_REJECT
property.name: persist.radio.manual_nw_rej_ct

property.description: ingore service domain in CAMPED state for voice registration state reporting
property.name: persist.radio.ignore_dom_time

property.description: 1X roaming MTU size
property.name: persist.radio.1x_roam_mtu_size

property.description: LTE tune away
property.name: persist.radio.lte_tuneaway_%(instance)

property.description: Allow modem to power up and shutdown in airplay mode
property.name: persist.radio.apm_mdm_not_pwdn

property.description: CN MCC value
property.name: persist.radio.cn_mcc

property.description: TW MCC value
property.name: persist.radio.tw_mcc

property.description: default mbn path under data patition
property.name: persist.radio.mbn_path

property.description: subscription ID for current instance
property.name: persist.radio.stack_id_%(instance)

property.description: The MT SMS Ack pending flag will be reset if telephony does not ack the MT message with a specified time. This time can be configured using this property. The value set is in seconds.
property.name: persist.radio.mt_sms_ack

property.description: Configure SMS link timer
property.name: persist.radio.sms_link_timer

property.description: Enable the feature to support to pass "force_on_dc" tlv while processing MO SMS over 3GPP2
property.name: persist.radio.force_on_dc

property.description: block MO SMS on 1x if this property is set to "1"
property.name: persist.radio.block_sms_on_1x

property.description: As there are cases where STK is not processing SUPS_IND, RIL has to process the susp_ind based on this property. It is used for control processing of sups_ind only once either by RIL or by STK.
property.name: persist.radio.process_sups_ind

property.description: This property is enabled to fix the mismatch of Extended Display Record between QMI VOICE and QMI RIL
property.name: persist.radio.0x9e_not_callname

property.description: If original number got modified and alpha tlv is NOT valid then by default RIL will notify the modified number to Telephony. If original number need to be displayed then set this property as "1" or "true".
property.name: persist.radio.orig_num_disp

property.description: voice CLIR for current instance ID
property.name: persist.radio.clir%(instance)

property.description: When this property is set to "1", RIL would need to forward QMI_VOICE_SPEECH_CODEC_INFO_IND_V02 message info to audio client
property.name: persist.radio.report_codec

property.description: enable or disable the called party subaddress in qcril_qmi_voice_request_dial
property.name: persist.radio.support_subaddr

property.description: When this property is set to "1", RIL distinguishes the input number into address and subaddress divided by the character '&'.
property.name: persist.radio.subaddr_amp

property.description: When a call is in incoming or waiting state, setting this property to "1" allows to reject the call using QMI_VOICE_ANSWER_CALL and setting the reject TLV to TRUE.
property.name: persist.radio.reject_cause_21

property.description: If enabled, prefix 'p' to subaddress
property.name: persist.radio.subaddr_ia5_id

property.description: enable or disable the feature to append the redirecting party number to the remote party number while reporting the number in get current call list.
property.name: persist.radio.redir_party_num

property.description: time gap between DTMF START and STOP
property.name: ro.ril.dtmf_interval

property.description: When user dials an emergency call while there is an active 1x voice call currently RIL reports the voice call number instead of emergency number. Change the behavior based on the property persist.radio.call_type. If the property is set to 0, then report the emergency call number. If the property is not set or set to values other than 0, then report the voice call number.
property.name: persist.radio.call_type

property.description: This property is used to guard the behavior in RIL when modem reports FACILITY_NOT_SUPPORTED. If property is set to "1", RIL will report GET_CLIP SUCCESS
property.name: persist.radio.facnotsup_as_nonw

property.description: If the property is set to "n", the incoming call shall be auto-answered after "n" milliseconds
property.name: persist.sys.tel.autoanswer.ms

property.description: If set to "true", enable on device logging for QXDM for voice calls.
property.name: ril.radio.voice_diag_logging

property.description: When the property is enabled, all volte calls are dropped and WPS call is sent over CS domain. By default, WPS call is treated as a normal call.
property.name: persist.radio.is_wps_enabled

property.description: When this property is enabled, duplicate detection for CellBroadcastReceiver is allowed and vice versa. Default value for this system property is set to true/enabled
property.name: persist.cb.dup_detection

property.description: Enable/disable encrypted calls feature. The feature is enabled by default, set the property to 0 to disable and 1 to enable
property.name: qcril.support.encrypted_calls

property.description: The property is used to guard the feature to set the voice domain pref on IMS capability changes. The voice domain preference will be set to PS_PREF on IMS enable and CS_ONLY on IMS disable
property.name: persist.radio.vdp_on_ims_cap
